mapper.update: update member set email=#{email}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber}, nick_name=#{nickName}, address=#{address}, update_date=sysdate where user_id=#{userId} and password=#{password}
update member set user_level = #{userLevel}, nick_name= #{nickName}, email=#{email}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber}, address=#{address}, update_date=sysdate where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS SEQ, USER_ID, NAME, PASSWORD, USER_LEVEL, PHONE_NUMBER, NICK_NAME, EMAIL, ADDRESS, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM MEMBER ) where seq between #{start} and #{end}
